amendment.description: Page 64, line 1, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $1,000,000)". Page 64, line 12, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $1,000,000)". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding by $1 million for the Southern New England Program under Geographic Programs.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Langevin amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. Langevin.
